com.facebook.litho.sections.widget

Class SectionBinderTarget

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.sections.widget.SectionBinderTarget
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SectionTree.Target, Binder<RecyclerView>

    public class SectionBinderTarget
extends Object
implements SectionTree.Target, Binder<RecyclerView>
    Implementation of SectionTree.Target that uses a RecyclerBinder.

      • setSize

        public void setSize(int width,
                    int height)
        Description copied from interface: Binder
        Set the width and height of the View that will be passed to the subsequent Binder.mount(ViewGroup), Binder.bind(ViewGroup) and Binder.unmount(ViewGroup) calls. Can be called by any thread.
        Specified by:
        setSize in interface Binder<RecyclerView>
        Parameters:
        width - Usually the view width minus horizontal padding.
        height - Usually the view height minus vertical padding.
